name: Minute Speeder
description:
A small game made in 3 hours for the TriJam. The theme was "1 minute", and you have exactly 1 minute left of fuel upon starting the game. The fuel bar is in the top left. Use the arrow keys or WASD to move, and space or z to shoot, and avoid other speeders, police speeders shooting at you, and cactus. Destroying a police speeder or other speeder will give you fuel, but shooting takes away fuel so be careful with your shots. Hitting an obstacle takes away a lot of fuel. (Inspired by the Tatooine speeder bikes in Star Wars) :) 

(Keep in mind this was made in 3 hours so there might be some bugs)

I made this entire game in the 3 hours, except for the hit flash effect and screenshake effect, which I took from another one of my projects. (Premade assets are allowed). It wasn't too hard to make considering every object behaves similarly, so there were lots of corners cut. I was going to make a high score system and some sounds, but I ran out of time so you'll just have to remember your scores and there are no sounds. I hope you like it! :)

Engine: Godot

Art: Piskel
